title: Apple
content: Millions saw the apple fall, but Newton was the one who asked why. (Bernard Baruch)

title: Banana
content: Intellectual property has the shelf life of a banana. (Bill Gates)

title: Grapes
content: You cannot eat a cluster of grapes at once, but it is very easy if you eat them one by one. (Jacques Roumain)

title: Mango
content: If you wait for the mango fruits to fall, you'd be wasting your time while others are learning how to climb the tree. (Michael Bassey Johnson)

title: Orange
content: I squeeze oranges every morning to make juice. (Utada Hikaru)
